Name: Red Slime
Desc:
Fire-Red Slime.
(Use) Burn target, -1 Defense on target

Name: White Slime
Desc:
Holly-White Slime.
(Use) +1 Defense on any other slime.

Name: King Slime
Desc:
King Slime.
(Use) Add one normal Slime from your hand to the field.

Name: Rock Spider
Desc:
Rock Spider.
(Use) -3 Power, +3 Defence untill your next turn.
